title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
### Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

**Product Overview:**

Elevate your holiday decor with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This set is designed to bring a touch of festive cheer to any space, combining the beauty of a 23.6-inch wreath with an 8.8-foot garland, both adorned with intricate details and warm LED lights. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, this set is a hassle-free way to decorate for the season.

**Key Features:**

- **Wreath Diameter:** 23.6 inches
- **Garland Length:** 8.8 feet
- **Decorative Elements:**
  - Snowflake pine needle branches
  - 2 types of pine cones
  - Berry clusters
  - Frosted branches
- **Lighting:**
  - 100 warm LED lights
  - Powered by 3 AA batteries (not included)
  - Timer function: 6 hours on, 18 hours off
- **No Assembly Required:** Ready to hang and enjoy
- **Materials:**
  - Sturdy, high-quality, and hypoallergenic
  - Equipped with fireproof pins for safety
- **Durability:**
  - Strong and durable, designed to last
  - Maintenance-free, no need for water, and will never fade
- **Suitability:**
  - Ideal for both indoor and outdoor use
  - Perfect for decorating walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows
- **After-Sales Service:**
  - 365-day warranty
  - 24/7 customer service availability

**Why Choose Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set?**

- **Instant Beauty:** With no assembly required, you can quickly transform your space with a festive touch.
- **High-Quality Construction:** Made from sturdy, high-quality materials that ensure longevity and safety.
- **Energy Efficient:** The LED lights are not only warm and inviting but also energy-efficient, helping you save on power usage.
- **Versatile Use:** Whether you're decorating your home or creating a festive atmosphere in a commercial space, this set is perfect for any setting.
- **Peace of Mind:** Enjoy a full year of warranty and round-the-clock customer service, ensuring you have a delightful holiday season without any worries.

**Customer Reviews:**

- "Absolutely beautiful! The wreath and garland are so realistic and the LED lights add a perfect warm glow. Highly recommend!" - Sarah M.
- "Very pleased with the quality and the ease of use. It's a great way to decorate without the hassle of real plants and lights." - John D.
- "The timer function is a lifesaver, and the product is much sturdier than I expected. It's our new holiday tradition!" - Emily R.

**Order Now and Bring the Magic of Christmas to Your Home!**

Make your holiday season easier and more beautiful with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order today and enjoy a hassle-free, stunningly decorated home.
